location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter reports arrival of Betsey SnowCaptain, David Phillips and Drake SnowCaptain, Jonathan Swift. The letter also discusses woolen sales and trade at length and states that Bushire's monthly accounts for February are enclosed (they are not contained in the file however).
